scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/assignment/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/assignment
  set jcr:title{String} to "Assignment"
end
create service user pageCreationWorkflowServiceUser with path /home/users/system/assignment

set ACL for pageCreationWorkflowServiceUser
  allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /content/assignment/workflows
  allow jcr:all on /conf/assignment
end
